UNITED STATES SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE
COMMISSION Washington, D.C. 20549 FORM 6-K
Report of Foreign Private Issuer Pursuant to
Rule 13a-16or 15d-16under the Securities
Exchange Act of 1934
                                              
  For the month of       Commission File      
  August, 2024           Number: 1-14678      
                                              
CANADIAN IMPERIAL BANK OF COMMERCE
(Translation of registrants name into
English) CIBC Square, 81 Bay Street Toronto,
Ontario Canada M5J 0E7 (Address of principal
executive offices) Indicate by check mark
whether the registrant files or will file
annual reports under cover of Form 20-For Form
40-F:
                              
  Form 20-F ☐    Form 40-F ☑  
                              
SIGNATURES Pursuant to the requirements of the
Securities Exchange Act of 1934, the
registrant has duly caused this report to be
signed on its behalf by the undersigned,
thereunto duly authorized.
                                              
                       CANADIAN               
  Date:                IMPERIAL               
  August               BANK OF     /s/ Geoff  
  29, 2024     By:     COMMERCE    Dillon     
 ──────────────────────────────────────────── 
               Name:               Geoff      
                                   Dillon     
               Title:              Vice-Pre…  
                                              
Table of Contents In connection with the
quarterly report of Canadian Imperial Bank of
Commerce (the Bank) for the period ended
July 31, 2024, as filed under cover of a Form
6-Kwith the Securities and Exchange Commission
on the date hereof (the Report), the Bank
voluntarily furnished the following, copies of
which are attached as exhibits to this Form
6-K:
                                              
       certificates of the type contemplated  
  (a)  by Rule 13a-14 or Rule 15d-14 of the   
       Securities Exchange Act of 1934; and   
                                              
                                              
       certificates of the type contemplated  
  (b)  by Section 906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley   
       Act of 2002.                           
                                              
EXHIBIT INDEX
                                              
      Certificates  Rule 13a-14 or Rule       
  1.  15d-14 of the Securities Exchange Act   
      of 1934                                 
                                              
                                              
  2.  Certificates  Section 906 of            
      Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002
